name: Impossible Rush 3D
description:
Impossible Rush is hard and very interesting game that will test your attention and reaction. Impossible Rush is a complex of amazing tasks. Tap on the screen at the right time to overcome obstacles. The game includes many unique obstacles . Infinity level take the highest place in the standings with players around the world.
just HOP HOP and HOP

Warning: Impossible Rush is very addictive game!
How to Play
● Tap, Tap, Tap to get the ball past each obstacle.
● Stay calm to cross each obstacle.
● Timing and Patience are the keys to victory.
● Beat Every Challenge and get a High Score in Endless
● New Modes and Obstacles added with each update

Please provide feedback . We'd love to hear from you!
